101: Oops! Something went wrong with your request format.
102: It looks like you're missing a required parameter. Please check and try again.
103: Hmm, that parameter value doesn't seem right. Please verify and try again.
201: Oops! You need to be logged in to do that.
202: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this resource.
203: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
301: We couldn't find the resource you're looking for.
302: This resource already exists. Maybe check for duplicates?
303: There's a conflict with this resource. Please review and try again.
401: We couldn't connect to the database. Please try again later.
402: There was an error with the database query. Please try again.
403: Data integrity violation. Please check the data and try again.
501: Oops! Something went wrong on our end.
502: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
503: The gateway timed out. Please try again in a bit.
